Table of Contents

Interface ILogger

Namespace
Vts.Common.Logging
Assembly
Vts.dll

Manages logging.

public interface ILogger
Extension Methods
EnumerableExtensions.AsEnumerable<T>(T)
IEnumerableArrayExtensions.PopulateFromEnumerable2<T, TArray>(TArray, IEnumerable<T>)
FileIO.Clone<T>(T)
FileIO.WriteJsonToStream<T>(T, Stream)
FileIO.WriteToJson<T>(T, string)
FileIO.WriteToXMLStream<T>(T, Stream)
FileIO.WriteToXML<T>(T, string)
VtsJsonSerializer.WriteToJsonFile<T>(T, string)
VtsJsonSerializer.WriteToJson<T>(T)

Remarks

This is a facade for the different logging subsystems. It offers a simplified interface that follows IOC patterns and a simplified priority/level/severity abstraction.

Properties

IsDebugEnabled

Determines if messages of priority "debug" will be logged.

bool IsDebugEnabled { get; }

Property Value

bool

True if "debug" messages will be logged.

IsErrorEnabled

Determines if messages of priority "error" will be logged.

bool IsErrorEnabled { get; }

Property Value

bool

True if "error" messages will be logged.

IsFatalEnabled

Determines if messages of priority "fatal" will be logged.

bool IsFatalEnabled { get; }

Property Value

bool

True if "fatal" messages will be logged.

IsInfoEnabled

Determines if messages of priority "info" will be logged.

bool IsInfoEnabled { get; }

Property Value

bool

True if "info" messages will be logged.

IsWarnEnabled

Determines if messages of priority "warn" will be logged.

bool IsWarnEnabled { get; }

Property Value

bool

True if "warn" messages will be logged.

Methods

CreateChildLogger(string)

Create a new child logger. The name of the child logger is [current-loggers-name].[passed-in-name]

ILogger CreateChildLogger(string loggerName)

Parameters

loggerName string

The Subname of this logger.

Returns

ILogger

The New ILogger instance.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

If the name has an empty element name.

Debug(Func<string>)

Logs a debug message with lazily constructed message. The message will be constructed only if the IsDebugEnabled is true.

void Debug(Func<string> messageFactory)

Parameters

messageFactory Func<string>

Debug(string)

Logs a debug message.

void Debug(string message)

Parameters

message string

The message to log

Debug(string, Exception)

Logs a debug message.

void Debug(string message, Exception exception)

Parameters

message string

The message to log

exception Exception

The exception to log

DebugFormat(Exception, IFormatProvider, string, params object[])

Logs a debug message.

void DebugFormat(Exception exception, IFormatProvider formatProvider, string format, params object[] args)

Parameters

exception Exception

The exception to log

formatProvider IFormatProvider

The format provider to use

format string

Format string for the message to log

args object[]

Format arguments for the message to log
